thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Joshua Hines

author: Joshua Hines
title: Joshua Hines
text: I have ordered from them many, many times and I have not once had a single issue with them. Their shipping methods are superb; I never worry that my comics will arrive damaged because they so thoroughly package and secure them. They are apparently quite strict with grading, as I have ordered books from them that they graded fairly low to mid-tier and I thought the condition was great. Their prices are also exceptional. I would recommend MyComicShop.com to anyone looking to buy some comics online.
